metaDescription: OASIS LAGUNA 3 in El Raso, Los Alcazares. Luxury penthouses and apartments from €222,000. 2-3 bedrooms, delivery March 2027. By CONTRIMAR.

content.heroIntro:
OASIS LAGUNA 3 represents a transformative opportunity for savvy property investors and lifestyle seekers looking to establish themselves on the Costa Blanca. Developed by the trusted CONTRIMAR team, this exceptional new build project in El Raso, Los Alcazares, offers 6 exclusive units combining contemporary design with Spanish Mediterranean living. With prices starting from just €222,000, OASIS LAGUNA 3 delivers outstanding value in one of Murcia's most sought-after coastal communities.

This premium development features elegant penthouses and apartments with 2-3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms across built sizes of 85-103m². Each residence is crafted with meticulous attention to detail, incorporating modern amenities, high-quality finishes, and sustainable construction standards. The project is scheduled for completion on 01-03-2027, providing the perfect timeline for buyers seeking immediate investment returns or personal enjoyment.

Located in the vibrant El Raso district, OASIS LAGUNA 3 grants residents direct access to world-class beaches, championship golf courses, and a well-established international community where English is widely spoken. The development capitalizes on Los Alcazares' growing reputation as a premier destination for British and European buyers seeking authentic Spanish coastal living with modern conveniences.

locationSection.intro: El Raso is an established residential enclave within Los Alcazares, offering the perfect balance between peaceful Mediterranean living and convenient access to essential services. This desirable neighborhood has become increasingly popular with international buyers seeking authentic Spanish coastal culture combined with modern amenities. El Raso benefits from its proximity to pristine Blue Flag beaches, championship golf courses, and comprehensive healthcare facilities, all while maintaining a relaxed, welcoming atmosphere that appeals to families, retirees, and investors alike. The area is characterized by well-maintained properties, tree-lined streets, and a genuine sense of community among its diverse international population. Los Alcazares itself is rapidly emerging as one of the Costa Blanca's most attractive destinations, with property values appreciating at 8% year-on-year, making it an exceptional investment corridor for European buyers.
highlights: Beach: Multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes
Golf: Several championship courses within 15-20 minutes
Hospital: Regional hospital within 30 minutes, Private clinics available
Shopping: Mercadona, Lidl, Consum supermarkets within 5-10 minutes
Restaurants: Diverse international and Spanish dining within walking distance
Schools: International schools and British curriculum options nearby
Bus: Regular bus connections available, Car recommended for flexibility

propertyFeatures.intro: OASIS LAGUNA 3 is constructed to the highest contemporary standards, reflecting CONTRIMAR's commitment to quality and longevity. Each residence features premium materials, energy-efficient systems, and sophisticated design elements that maximize comfort and minimize maintenance costs. The development incorporates modern thermal technology, quality ceramic flooring, and contemporary fixtures throughout. Buyers can expect exceptional durability backed by professional construction oversight and a comprehensive warranty structure, ensuring peace of mind for years to come.
features: Private/communal swimming pool with filtered water systems
Double glazing with thermal break insulation
Modern bathroom fixtures with quality sanitary ware
Video entry system for enhanced security

content.investmentSection: OASIS LAGUNA 3 represents a compelling investment opportunity in one of Spain's fastest-growing property markets. Los Alcazares has demonstrated consistent property appreciation of 8% year-on-year, significantly outpacing broader European market trends. The development's strategic positioning offers exceptional rental potential, with comparable properties in the region achieving €800 per week during peak season. Notably, OASIS LAGUNA 3 properties are priced at approximately 40% below comparable offerings in established Spanish island markets, providing significant value differentiation. The area's established international community, modern infrastructure, and proven tourism appeal create a stable rental environment for investors. With completion targeted for March 2027, early purchasers benefit from pre-completion pricing and the opportunity to capitalize on market appreciation before delivery. Los Alcazares' growing popularity as a retirement and lifestyle destination for British and European buyers continues to drive demand, supporting both long-term appreciation and consistent rental returns.

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in OASIS LAGUNA 3?
faqs.answer: Properties in OASIS LAGUNA 3 start from €222,000. The development offers Penthouse and Apartment options with 2-3 bedrooms and built sizes ranging from 85-103m². Specific pricing varies by unit configuration. Contact our sales team via WhatsApp for current availability and detailed pricing on remaining units.

faqs.question: When will OASIS LAGUNA 3 be completed?
faqs.answer: OASIS LAGUNA 3 is scheduled for completion on 01-03-2027. CONTRIMAR provides a comprehensive 10-year structural warranty covering all major building components. Buyers can request specific delivery schedules and completion timelines by contacting our team directly.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of OASIS LAGUNA 3?
faqs.answer: CONTRIMAR is the developer of OASIS LAGUNA 3. They have an established track record delivering quality residential properties throughout Los Alcazares and the surrounding Murcia region. CONTRIMAR is recognized for professional construction standards, attention to detail, and reliable project delivery.

faqs.question: Is Los Alcazares a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, Los Alcazares is an excellent location for property investment and lifestyle purchase. The area features an established international community where English is commonly spoken, making integration straightforward for foreign buyers. Property values demonstrate consistent 8% year-on-year appreciation. Amenities include a regional hospital within 30 minutes, multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes, championship golf courses, and comprehensive shopping options via Mercadona, Lidl, and Consum.

faqs.question: How far is OASIS LAGUNA 3 from the beach?
faqs.answer: OASIS LAGUNA 3 is located within 20 minutes driving to multiple Blue Flag beaches, with some beaches accessible in under 15 minutes. The development's El Raso location provides excellent coastal access while maintaining peaceful residential surroundings. The nearest beaches offer water sports, beach clubs, and Mediterranean dining experiences.

faqs.question: What amenities are near OASIS LAGUNA 3?
faqs.answer: OASIS LAGUNA 3 benefits from excellent proximity to essential services: Mercadona and Lidl supermarkets within 5-10 minutes, Regional hospital and private clinics within 30 minutes, several championship golf courses within 15-20 minutes, International schools with British curriculum options, bus connections for public transport, and diverse restaurants and cafes within walking distance.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreign nationals can purchase property in Spain without residency requirements. EU citizens enjoy unrestricted purchasing rights. Non-EU buyers can also purchase property but may require an NIE (Spanish tax identification number) and should consult with a Spanish property lawyer regarding any specific documentation requirements for their nationality.

faqs.question: What are the typical costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Beyond the purchase price, Spanish property buyers typically encounter: Transfer Tax (6-10% depending on region, lower in Murcia), Notary and Registry fees (approximately 1-2% of property price), and potential solicitor fees (0.5-1%). First-time buyers may qualify for tax reductions in some regions. Ongoing costs include annual property tax (IBI) and community fees for developments like OASIS LAGUNA 3.

faqs.question: What is the property market trend in Los Alcazares?
faqs.answer: Los Alcazares demonstrates strong positive market momentum with property values appreciating at 8% year-on-year. This consistent growth reflects increasing demand from European investors and lifestyle buyers seeking coastal properties with authentic Spanish character. The market benefits from improving infrastructure, expanding international community presence, and growing recognition as a premier Costa Blanca destination.

faqs.question: What is the rental potential for OASIS LAGUNA 3 properties?
faqs.answer: Properties comparable to OASIS LAGUNA 3 in Los Alcazares achieve approximately €800 per week rental income during peak season. The established tourism infrastructure, proximity to beaches and golf, and international community presence create strong rental demand. Year-round rental potential exists, with seasonal variations reflecting typical Mediterranean patterns.

content.conclusion: OASIS LAGUNA 3 by CONTRIMAR represents a rare convergence of exceptional value, proven investment potential, and authentic Mediterranean lifestyle in El Raso, Los Alcazares. With prices starting from €222,000—40% below comparable island markets—combined with verified 8% annual appreciation trends and strong rental income potential, this development offers compelling returns for discerning investors. The March 2027 delivery timeline positions early purchasers to capitalize on market momentum while enjoying immediate community benefits from an established international environment where English is widely spoken. Whether seeking a Mediterranean retirement home, investment property, or vacation base near world-class beaches and golf courses, OASIS LAGUNA 3 delivers exceptional opportunities. Contact our sales team today via WhatsApp to explore available units, receive personalized investment analysis, and secure your position in this sought-after coastal development. The Costa Blanca's most attractive chapter awaits at OASIS LAGUNA 3.
